remarks: Restricting an undirected simple graph by removing one vertex (and all edges ending at this vertex), analogous to ~ usgrares1 .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jan-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 10-Jan-2020.)
statement:
usgresvm1.v $e |- V = ( Vtx ` G ) $.
usgresvm1.e $e |- E = ( Edges ` G ) $.
usgresvm1.f $e |- F = { e e. E | N e/ e } $.
usgresvm1 $p |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ N e. V ) -> ( V \ { N } ) USGrph ( _I |` F ) ) $.
$d E e $.
$d G e $.
$d N e $.
$d V e $.
